data.message: Listen to the lyrics there both talking about there God

replies.message: U listen to the lyrics em is talking about proof as always u can tell the man misses his friend don't give a s##t who yala is talking about
Even shows his proof tat

Talking about his higher power which in his case is God and proof is dead, in his mind proof is sitting up there with his best friend. Proof was his best friend yes and of course when he's talking about a higher power or God its going to bring up emotions related to proof but its obvious what he's talking about.
Eminem is for a fact very religious, but yelawolf is deep-rooted atheist. Who says there has to be an answer to who they are referring to? the song is epic

I can agree it really doesn't matter every song talks to people differently it  is a great song just like most every song Em does. Whatever you get out of it is for you. The question was probably asked just to see other people point of view but it really didn't need an answer that fact if that it does speak to people  and thats what matters.

Proof we'll never forget you... 😓❤️
Em? I love you.
Yall are so fuckin dumb, learn your artist before you interpret lyrics....
He says "who you think im talking bout" for a reason. Hes talking about himself as a higher power because of how he speaks to people.
That dont take away from the whole song and yeah proof is up there wit guys higher power looking out

Yeah buddy learn your artist one he aint religious and he dont think hes his.own higher power he talks about it all the time how he found God, God helped him get sober AA and God he aint religious but he spiritual thats not guessing thats from his mouth from lyrics and statements. He may consider himself a God in music but def not his own higher power. Def greatest artist. If you hear him talk about the difference between certain lyrics and reality you maybe able yo see when he speaking truth or just talking shit in songs.
Wtf it really dont mater fucking greatest artist. The sings speak for themself it dont matter what you hear if they speak to you that's all that matters. Dueces
They are talking about their enemies actually
That's why em took on the song because it's so open for interpretation
the man has said he's sold his "soul" to Satan numerous times in his lyrics, interpret that sean.
You do know he believes in a higher power he calls God and talks about t lifting him up and sending people up to him. But fuck it don't matter
none of us know what he's talking about to be honest.
True enough
Its a song to their ENEMIES, listen to the lyrics.  "Ima send you straight up to my Best Friend"
Whether the best friend is god, proof or whoever, they are talking about sending their enemies to them
Watch the interview fucking dicks. Jesus
Sending their enemies to meet their best friend was only a small snippet in the song... That's like saying the whole alphabet is all about the letters J K and L...
Wait the alphabet isn't about j k and l....
I didn't know he was referring to Proof until I saw the vid
Thats because he's not . He's just a part of what he's talking about in a whole

Just read the chorus! 
"To the Father, Son and Holy Spirit
I hold You nearest
My best friend, best friend
Let the trumpets blow with Your appearance
I can almost hear it
My best friend, best friend"
Eminem's part.. "Who you think I'm talking bout? Lifts me up when I'm down and out! Still look to him without a doubt! Still got a best friend, best friend!" 
☝❤
